full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` SLOB DPON CHEN MO PADMA G'A RA'I ZHABS KYIS MDZAD PA'I 'BUM BSANG GI NANG DU 'DON PA'I LDING RGYAS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(DPAL RBA SGRENG GI GDAN PAR SNGA LOR NAS GANG 'TSAMS YOD RUNG CHA TSANG BA ZHIG MI 'DUG PAS, HA LAM 'DI LA NGOS BAS RGYU SBYAR TE 'PHYING DKAR GTZO BO 'KHOR BCAS DANG, DUR BDAG YAB YUM GYI 'TSAMS GSANG 'JUG THOGS BSGRAL PAS KYANG 'TSANG TSAMS YIG 'BUM BSANG GI LGING ZHIG DGOS ZHES PHYAG MDZOD PA ZHABS DRUNG DU BSKAL BZANG RGYAL MTSAN NAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED AA CHI THU NO MONG HANG BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS DA 'DI BZHIN DU SUG BRIS SU GYIS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,DZA YANTU: :)
author_simple: BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS,
